title: Hydro Dam Trash Rack Cleaning
description: An operator at a hydroelectric dam detects a drop in efficiency and suspects that the trash racks (which filter debris) are clogged.

tasks.description: Monitor the pressure differential across the trash racks.
tasks.expected_outcome: System is monitoring the head loss across the racks.

tasks.description: The system detects an increase in the pressure drop, indicating a blockage.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates an alert for a clogged trash rack.

tasks.description: Dispatch a crew to operate the automated trash rake to clean the racks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator sends a command to start the cleaning cycle.
